content.raw:
[gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:409](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/e75f35e8fbd61480cdd2d9305c27964876d34fd6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc?at=default#cl-409)

Actually I got **no** idea how this ever compiled and it looks broken to me.
The third parameter in the call just doesn't make any sense.

It should be a bool but is a LinkPtr.
I suppose the proper value here is _checkParentTree
to just pass on that parameter.
Was this implicitly cast before?

Maybe I simply miss something. Please have a look.

EDIT! Here's the full error log:

```
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc: In member function 'void gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, const LinkPtr&, bool)':
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:405:64: error: no matching function for call to 'gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::Link>&, const LinkPtr&)'
           this->AddConnectedLinks(_linksOut, *parentLink, _link);
                                                                ^
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:405:64: note: candidate is:
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:368:6: note: void gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, const LinkPtr&, bool)
 void JointController::AddConnectedLinks(Link_V &_linksOut,
      ^
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:368:6: note:   no known conversion for argument 3 from 'const LinkPtr {aka const boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::Link>}' to 'bool'
```
content.html:
gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:409

Actually I got no idea how this ever compiled and it looks broken to me. The third parameter in the call just doesn't make any sense.

It should be a bool but is a LinkPtr. I suppose the proper value here is _checkParentTree to just pass on that parameter. Was this implicitly cast before?

Maybe I simply miss something. Please have a look.

EDIT! Here's the full error log:

/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc: In member function 'void gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, const LinkPtr&, bool)':
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:405:64: error: no matching function for call to 'gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::Link>&, const LinkPtr&)'
           this->AddConnectedLinks(_linksOut, *parentLink, _link);
                                                                ^
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:405:64: note: candidate is:
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:368:6: note: void gazebo::physics::JointController::AddConnectedLinks(gazebo::physics::Link_V&, const LinkPtr&, bool)
 void JointController::AddConnectedLinks(Link_V &_linksOut,
      ^
/usr/src/gazebo-1.8.6/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc:368:6: note:   no known conversion for argument 3 from 'const LinkPtr {aka const boost::shared_ptr<gazebo::physics::Link>}' to 'bool'
